subtitle: Fresh tender chicken coated in crispy breadcrumbs and served with a citrus sauce.

method.text: Dust chicken portions first with seasoned flour. Dip into beaten egg. Coat evenly with breadcrumbs.
Heat butter and oil in a large frying pan. Add chicken breasts and cook for about 5-6 min each side.
Drain cooked chicken on absorbent paper and arrange on serving platter. Spoon sauce along centre of chicken to serve.

title: Chicken breasts with orange cream
